tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE nuclear_accidents (
    accident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accident_date DATE,
    accident_location VARCHAR(255),
    accident_cause TEXT,
    lessons_learned TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE nuclear_accidents (
    accident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accident_date DATE,
    cause TEXT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    fatalities INT
);

CREATE TABLE prevention_lessons (
    lesson_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accident_id INT,
    lesson_learned TEXT,
    recommendation TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_accident_id FOREIGN KEY (accident_id) REFERENCES nuclear_accidents(accident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE NuclearAccidents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE LessonsLearned (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accident_id INT,
    lesson VARCHAR(255),
    action_plan TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (accident_id) REFERENCES NuclearAccidents(id)
);

CREATE TABLE nuclear_accidents (
  accident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  accident_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  cause VARCHAR(255),
  lesson_learned TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE accident_causes (
  cause_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  cause_description TEXT,
  accident_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (accident_id) REFERENCES nuclear_accidents(accident_id)
)

CREATE TABLE prevention_lessons (
  lesson_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lesson_description TEXT,
  accident_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (accident_id) REFERENCES nuclear_accidents(accident_id)
)

CREATE TABLE accident_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  accident_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (accident_id) REFERENCES nuclear_accidents(accident_id)
)

CREATE TABLE affected_persons (
  person_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  person_name VARCHAR(255),
  accident_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (accident_id) REFERENCES nuclear_accidents(accident_id)
)
